original_text: You will go into the land that the Lord promised to give you. Then you must continue to obey these rules.
korean_text: 너희는 여호와께서 허락하신 대로 너희에게 주시는 땅에 이를 때에 이 예식을 지킬 것이라

sentences.original_text: You will go into the land
that the Lord promised to give you
Then you must continue to obey
